name: Mushroom Cult
description:
Controls:
Movement -- Arrow Keys
Wall Jumping -- Left & Right on walls
Faster Wall sliding -- Down ( when on walls )
Attack -- D key
Switch perspective on/off monster -- Spacebar
Exit Game -- ESC
Full Screen -- F1

My entry for the 2017 Bad Boxart Challenge. I went with the game cover for the Spectrum game "Bloody" ( and it is ). Download for Windows only.
